entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: A team in the wizarding school, Harry is the Keeper for this team.

entities.name: wood
entities.description: The teacher who is explaining the game to Harry.

entities.name: quaffle
entities.description: A ball used in the game, described as red and larger than the Bludgers.

entities.name: bludgers
entities.description: Two identical balls that are smaller than the Quaffle and jet black.

relationships.description: Harry is the Keeper for Gryffindor team.
Wood is explaining how to play with the Quaffle.
Harry is being shown what the Bludgers do by Wood.
Wood owns or has control over the Bludgers.
